column4: ok im a little frustrated (understatement) and i need help... i have 2 graphics cards that i have tried separately to run 2 monitors off of one is an nvidia geforce fx 5200 the other is an ati radeon 9700... i cant get desktop effects to work on either of these cards but a crappy dell from 98 can run em without a card... why cant i run desktop effects and how do i get my 2nd monitor to work when screens and graphics wount help me? thanks in
i have the ati card in here right now
your not using 2 vid cards then?
no, i just tried 2 separate cards for the same action = 1 card 2 displays
well dont feel bad cause mine doesnt work either..
its frustrating every new build i get more and more dissapointed
and this is a fresh install
is what happens your window manager disappears?

nah that was happening with the nvidia card but i fixed that and then i tried setting up dual monitors using screens and graphics, it tells me to restart, i restart and then it tells me its running in low graphics mode
i havent done the compiz fusion thing yet
i thought it was just compiz
i havent installed that yet... should i?
